main.name: Sam Kautz
main.description: I'm a self taught web developer that enjoys working with React, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Node, and Bootstrap.
main.bio: Welcome to my resume website! I built this site using React, Jquery, HTML5, CSS3, Node, and a few API's. I enjoy working with all of these languages and am exploring new languages all the time. Keep reading to find a little more information about me and my work!
main.contactmessage: Use this contact form to reach out and I will get back to you as soon as possible!

education.description: I graduated from The University of Central Oklahoma with a B.A. in Finance and a minor in Business.

work.title: Financial Advisor
work.description: At GuidePath I worked with cleints by providing investment and or retirement guidance, initiated buys and sells on behalf of clients, and provided other general retirement advice regarding 403(b) retirement accounts.

work.title: Assistant Manager
work.description: I began at Starbucks as a Barista and was eventually promoted to Shift Leader in 2007 and Assistnant Manager in 2009. I was responsible for creating schedules for all staff, dropping daily bank deposits, opening and closing the store, and managing 5-10 employees during shifts.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.category: Calculator built with JavaScript, HTML5, and CCS3.

projects.title: Random Quote Generator
projects.category: Random quote generator built using JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.

projects.title: React Website
projects.category: Website I built using React, Jquery, Node, Javascript, CSS3, HTML5, and a few API's.

testimonials.text: Sam did a great job building a wesbite for our small business! We have already had a few messages and calls from the new site and love the clean look. We would highly recommend his work.
